metadata.title: CVE-2022-48730 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  dma-buf: heaps: Fix potential spectre v1 gadget  It appears like nr could be a Spectre v1 gadget as it's supplied by a user and used as an array index. Prevent the contents of kernel memory from being leaked to userspace via speculative execution by using array_index_nospec.   [sumits: added fixes and cc: stable tags]
